metadata.title: CVE-2021-47204 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: dpaa2-eth: fix use-after-free in dpaa2_eth_removeAccess to netdev after free_netdev() will cause use-after-free bug.Move debug log before free_netdev() call to avoid it.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
